content:
Yes, Bosnia and Herzegovina has several UNESCO World Heritage sites, which include:

1. Mostar Old Bridge Area
2. Mehmed Paša Sokolović Bridge in Višegrad
3. Old City of Sarajevo
4. Stećci Medieval Tombstones Graveyards
5. Stari Ras and Sopoćani
6. The natural and architectural ensemble of the Pocitelj village
7. The natural and architectural ensemble of Blagaj
